name: Wipe3 - fit to merge 3 color blocks
name_original: Wipe3 - fit to merge 3 color blocks
description:
Swipe and match the colors! You score when you shift three or more cells of the same color to adjacent positions, and the more you are able to put together the more you will score! Get started now and see if you can make it to a hundred!

[Features]
- Play with squares of various colors
- Swipe to any directions and squares will flow as you direct them
- Squares pack closely with each other like a gravitational effect
- When squares of the same color are matched, they will be eliminated leaving space for more squares to come out, and for the game to carry on
- Score varies vastly by the number of squares eliminated in a same move
- Relaxing gameplay with no time limit
- Both game center and social sharing functions are integrated to provide better experience when playing with friends
